item.description:
COME MEET ALTHEA BLACKFORD   

 EXECUTIVE PRODUCER OF Style It Up

BAY STATE COLLEGE, 31 St JAMES, BOSTON, MA

DECEMBER 14, 2011  BEGINNING AT 6:00 PM


 SEASONS GREETINGS BOSTON FASHION MEETUP MEMBERS! I am thrilled to tell you that Boston's own Althea Blackford of Style It Up and host Olga Medvedev and the rest of the team will join us on December 14th to talk about her fashion TV show Style It Up which focuses on all things fashion industry related here in New England. Style It Up provides viewers with useful and timely information about our area's fashion designers, industry players, and all the best fashion events. Althea looks forward to taking your questions after her presentation.

About Style It Up: Althea created Style It Up in June 2005 and is produced by Ms. Blackford's production company - VStyle Productions.  Style It Up showcases designers ranging from emerging to established and follows them through out their careers in addition to profiling other careers in the fashion industry such as stylists, make-up artists, and fashion show producers.

Target Audience:
Fashion Designers - emerging and established, Fashion models - emerging and established
Fashion, Style & Beauty Magazines, Fashion & Style Bloggers
Beauty Salons, Fashion Retailers
Art Institutes & Cultural Associations, Fashionistas

www.styleitup.net


Althea’s Bio:
Althea has spent most of her career in the areas of production and entertainment. After graduating from Northeastern University in 2003 with a Bachelor’s in Communication Studies and extensive internship experience under her belt, Althea went on to pursue a number of exciting opportunities. While continuing work as Theatre House Manager at the Northeastern theatre, Althea produced fashion shows for Banutu Real World Productions and continues work as Multi-Media Technician at Harvard University. Althea graduated with honors from Bay State College in 2009, and has remained active in the Bay State College community through the Alumni network and now through on their Board of Trustees.

 

Bay State College located in the heart of Back Bay offering Bachelor and Associate Degrees in Fashion Merchandising and Associate Degrees in Fashion Design.

Please visit www.baystate.edu.
item.how_to_find_us: 2nd Floor, Room 228 (Take right through glass doors-classroom down hall on left)
item.name: COME MEET: Althea Blackford of Style It Up TV
